title: Great Business Hotel
text: This is the FIRST Novotel that I checked-in to last June of 2016. First impression its showing its age and it is clean and strategically situated near major shopping mall, grocery, convenience stores, restaurants and the Paris Metro. Novotel Paris La DÃ©fense is a great hotel with a good restaurant for breakfast and it is located in Paris' major business district (very good for business travellers). The accommodation that I got is good with a view of the neighbouring building/apartments. Bathroom is well-appointed and for the first time i stayed in a hotel the bath and the toiled is separate (very unusual for me). i had a pleasant time in this hotel and definitely will recommend to family and friends. See you again! Paris!
